title: free coaching
body: offering free coaching for the first 10 people to add burstfire302 and message me.

replies.body: I'd be interested in some coaching but through what methods are you going to be reviewing our performance and pointing out which things we're doing wrong? I got into silver this season but I don't feel up to scratch so I'd really like some advice (also I main zilean but I'm quite fine with transitioning to a different support like alistair, janna, lulu, ect...).

i do 3 different types: vod review, q + a and lecture. basically vod review i watch your games and give you feedback live with google hangouts or sharescreen; q + a is just that; and lecture would be like me explaining how to play a champ/when to take objectives
I'd be more than willing to have some coaching <3
